title: Expanded Council Personas
description: Expand the council tool with domain-specific persona sets: Technical Experts, Business Experts, Creative Experts, and support for custom persona definitions
acceptance_criteria: 15+ predefined personas available across 4 domain categories
Personas have distinct voices, concerns, and expertise areas
Backward compatible with existing council calls
Test coverage for all new personas

phases.name: Design Persona Library Architecture
phases.description: Create the foundational architecture for the persona library system

subtasks.title: Create persona library types and interfaces
subtasks.description: Define TypeScript interfaces for PersonaCategory, PredefinedPersona, PersonaLibrary, and enhanced PersonaData with category support
subtasks.notes: TypeScript interfaces fully implemented in src/personas/types.ts. Includes PersonaCategory, PredefinedPersona, PersonaLibrary, and EnhancedPersonaData with comprehensive category support. Additional helper interfaces (PersonaCreationOptions, PersonaQueryOptions, PersonaSearchResult) added for enhanced functionality. All interfaces include proper TypeScript types and JSDoc documentation.

subtasks.title: Create persona registry system
subtasks.description: Implement PersonaRegistry class to store, retrieve, and query predefined personas by category, ID, or expertise
subtasks.notes: PersonaRegistry class fully implemented in src/personas/registry.ts. Includes comprehensive functionality: persona registration (single and bulk), category management, retrieval by ID/category/expertise/tags, advanced query and search capabilities with relevance scoring, and utility methods (counts, existence checks, library export). Features singleton pattern with global personaRegistry instance. All methods include proper validation and error handling.

subtasks.title: Create persona factory for instantiation
subtasks.description: Implement PersonaFactory to create persona instances from predefined templates or custom definitions
subtasks.notes: PersonaFactory class fully implemented in src/personas/factory.ts. Includes comprehensive functionality: create personas from predefined templates with merge/replace strategies, create fully custom personas with validation, convert between EnhancedPersonaData and base PersonaData formats, create multiple personas from IDs or categories, clone personas, and helper methods for querying available personas. Features singleton pattern with global personaFactory instance.
